mms_1b_hyp: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं

llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi
TRANSCRIPTION: वे कुछ करते ही नहीं
CONFIDENCE: high
REASONING: Whisper's transcription "वे कुछ करते कियो नहीं" is close, but the correct word is "ही" instead of "कियो". MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained's transcription "वे कुछ करते को नही" is also close, but it has a small typo. OmniASR's transcription "vi kuछ kartekju nehín" is not accurate. MMS-1B's transcription "तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं" is completely unrelated to the actual audio. Therefore, I combined the best elements from Whisper and MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained to get the most accurate transcription.
